prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with a sleek blue body and sharp teeth.
I want a Pokemon that looks like a small shark with a vibrant red belly.
Generate an adorable ground-type creature with a rounded shape and tiny fins.
Make a Pokemon that has a blue and red color scheme and a friendly personality.
Imagine a Pokemon resembling a mini dragon that loves to dig underground.
Design a small aquatic creature that has a unique shark-like appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of both land and sea in its design.
